name: Cube Adventure
description:
Cube adventure is a classic minimalist 3D adventure that will help you pass the evening.You will have to go through the levels and solve small puzzles in them that may occur at the level, but be careful there may be enemies at the levels who will not be happy to let you reach the end with everything.After all, if you die, you have to start all over again.Cube adventure does not forgive mistakes.


Key Features :

- Minimalistic 3D graphics

- Pleasant music

- Relaxing gameplay.Just don't make mistakes :)
